body_html:
Thanks @yaroslavvb for quick response.

Sorry about my statement. When I mention "worker", I mean the "worker task" not including "ps".

I thinks the actual workers should exit after training. And sometimes they work like what we expect but sometimes not.

body:
Thanks @yaroslavvb for quick response.

Sorry about my statement. When I mention "worker", I mean the "worker task" not including "ps". 

I thinks the actual workers should exit after training. And sometimes they work like what we expect but sometimes not.
